title: Futile Calculations - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Josei   Romance   Supernatural
tags: Ancient China   Beautiful Female Lead   Black Belly   Cultivation   Destiny   Divination   Fated Lovers   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Military   Misunderstandings   Naive Protagonist   Nobles   Prophecies   Schemes And Conspiracies   Secret Identity   Student-Teacher Relationship
author: Big Grey Wolf With Wings   長著翅膀的大灰狼
description:
“Ji Xiaoli!”  Chen Yubai clenched his teeth.  “What exactly did I owe you in my past life?”

“I…….I don’t know……but…….don’t you know?  Are you not a fortune teller?”

The millennium cold jade bed instantly sizzled with frost.

“I am the Guoshi!  Lord Guoshi!  Don’t call me a fortune teller again!”>
